compliant.section: 本行將在事前或經由註冊登錄方式取得您的同意後，傳送商業性資料或電子郵件給您。
compliant.legal provisions: When processing is based on consent, the controller shall be able to demonstrate that the data subject has consented to processing of his or her personal data.

compliant.section: 本行除了在該資料或是電子郵件上註明是由本行發送，也會在該資料或電子郵件上提供您能隨時停止接收這些資料或電子郵件的方法、說明或功能連結。
compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall take appropriate measures to provide any information referred to in Articles 13 and 14 and any communication under Articles 15 to 22 and 34 relating to processing to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language, in particular for any information addressed specifically to a child. The information shall be provided in writing, or by other means, including, where appropriate, by electronic means. When requested by the data subject, the information may be provided orally, provided that the identity of the data subject is proven by other means.

compliant.section: 本行網站為保護使用者個人資料，維護隱私權，使用者如果對於本隱私權聲明、或與個人資料有關之相關事項，可利用本網站線上留言服務與本行聯絡，或致電本行客戶服務中心，我們會提供最完整的說明。

The information shall be provided in writing, or by other means, including, where appropriate, by electronic means. non_compliant.section:
自我保護措施
若您利用電腦或行動裝置，對本網站/本應用程式進行各項服務或查詢前，請先安裝相關的防毒軟體，定期掃毒，避免連結/瀏覽來路不明的網站/信件。並請妥善保管您的密碼或任何個人資料，不要將任何個人資料，尤其是密碼提供給任何人。在您使用完本行於本網站/本應用程式所提供的各項服務功能後，務必記得登出帳戶，若您是與他人共享電腦或使用公共電腦，切記要關閉瀏覽器視窗，以防止他人讀取您的個人資料或信件。
non_compliant.amend: While this section provides helpful advice, it places the onus of security solely on the user. Under GDPR, the data controller (the bank in this case) is responsible for implementing appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk. This section should be amended to explicitly state the bank's own security measures.

non_compliant.section:
修訂
本行網站將會視需要(如:因應社會環境變遷、業務需求、科技進步與法令規章修改等)不定期修訂本行所提供的隱私權保護聲明，以落實保障您隱私權之立意。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide the data subject with the following information: ... (f) the right to withdraw consent at any time, where the processing is based on consent pursuant to point (a) of Article 6(1) or point (a) of Article 9(2); ... (g) where processing is based on point (f) of Article 6(1), the existence of the right to object to processing.
non_compliant.amend: This section should specify how users will be informed of any changes to the privacy policy, and whether their consent will be sought again for any material changes. It should also explicitly mention the user's right to withdraw consent and the right to object to processing.
